subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Despite Sidney Crosby’s 102 points and Alexander Ovechkin’s amazing 52 goals and 106 points, the Penguins and Capitals combined for fewer victories than Ottawa, the Eastern Conference champion.
snippet: Despite Sidney Crosby’s 102 points and Alexander Ovechkin’s amazing 52 goals and 106 points, the Penguins and Capitals combined for fewer victories than Ottawa, the Eastern Conference champion.
